original_text: If a prophet has a dream, he should say what it is. If a prophet receives a message from me, he should speak that message faithfully. But dreams are very different from my messages. Straw is not the same as wheat! If a prophet has a dream, he should say what it is. If a prophet receives a message from me, he should speak that message faithfully. But dreams are very different from my messages. Straw is not the same as wheat!
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀이니라 꿈을 꾼 선지자는 꿈을 말할 것이요 내 말을 받은 자는 성실함으로 내 말을 말할 것이라 겨가 어찌 알곡과 같겠느냐

sentences.original_text: If a prophet has a dream
he should say what it is
If a prophet receives a message from me
he should speak that message faithfully
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 메시지를 충실하게 말해야 한다

sentences.original_text: But dreams are very different from my messages
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 꿈은 나의 메시지와 매우 다르다

sentences.original_text: Straw is not the same as wheat
